agreement between the Company and the recipient of a Restricted Share that contains the terms, conditions and restrictions pertaining to such Restricted Share. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:15%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>17.38</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<B>SAR</B>&#148; means a stock appreciation right granted under the Plan. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:15%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>17.39</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<B>SAR Agreement</B>&#148; means the agreement between the Company and an Optionee that contains the terms, conditions and restrictions pertaining to
his or her SAR. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:15%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>17.40</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<B>Service</B>&#148; means service as an Employee,
Outside Director or Consultant. Unless otherwise determined by the Committee or otherwise provided in the Plan or Award agreement, Service shall continue notwithstanding a change in status from an Employee, Consultant or Outside Director to another
such status. An event that causes a Parent, Subsidiary or Affiliate to cease having status as a Parent, Subsidiary or Affiliate shall be deemed to discontinue the Service of that entity&#146;s Employees, Outside Directors and Consultants unless such
persons retain the status of Employee, Outside Director or Consultant of the Company or a remaining Parent, Subsidiary or Affiliate. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:15%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>17.41</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<B>Shareholder Approval Date</B>&#148; means January&nbsp;5, 2010 which was the date on which the adoption of the Plan was approved by the
Company&#146;s shareholders. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:15%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>17.42</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<B>Stock Option Agreement</B>&#148; means
the agreement between the Company and an Optionee that contains the terms, conditions and restrictions pertaining to his or her Option. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:15%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>17.43</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<B>Stock Unit</B>&#148; means a bookkeeping entry representing the equivalent of one Common Share, as awarded under the Plan. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:15%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>17.44</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<B>Stock Unit Agreement</B>&#148; means the agreement between the Company and the
recipient of Stock Units that contains the terms, conditions and restrictions pertaining to such Stock Units. </FONT></P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">16 </FONT></P>



<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:15%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>17.45</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &#147;<B>Subsidiary</B>&#148; means any corporation
(other than the Company) in an unbroken chain of corporations beginning with the Company, if each of the corporations other than the last corporation in the unbroken chain owns stock possessing 50% or more of the total combined voting power of all
classes of stock in one of the other corporations in such chain. A corporation that attains the status of a Subsidiary on a date after the adoption of the Plan shall be considered a Subsidiary commencing as of such date. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:15%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>17.46</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<B>Substitute Award</B>&#148; means a Substitute Option, Substitute SAR,
Substitute Restricted Share or Substitute Stock Unit granted in accordance with the terms of the Plan. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:15%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>17.47</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<B>Substitute Option</B>&#148; means an Option granted in substitution for, or
upon the conversion of, an option granted by another entity to purchase equity securities in the granting entity. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:15%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>17.48</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<B>Substitute SAR</B>&#148; means a SAR granted in substitution for, or upon the
conversion of, a stock appreciation right granted by another entity with respect to equity securities in the granting entity. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:15%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>17.49</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<B>Substitute Restricted Share</B>&#148; means a Restricted Share granted in
substitution for a restricted share granted by another entity with respect to equity securities in the granting entity. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:15%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>17.50</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<B>Substitute Stock Unit</B>&#148; means a Stock Unit granted in substitution for,
or upon the conversion of, a stock unit granted by another entity with respect to equity securities in the granting entity. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:15%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>17.51</B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;<B>Ten Percent Shareholder</B>&#148; means any person who, directly or by
attribution under Section&nbsp;424(d) of the Code, owns stock possessing more than ten percent (10%)&nbsp;of the total combined voting power of all classes of stock of the Company or of any Parent or Subsidiary on the date of Option grant.
</FONT></P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">17 </FONT></P>


</BODY></HTML>

 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Exhibit 10.42 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Overland Storage, Inc. </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>2009 Equity Incentive Plan </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Notice of Stock Unit Award </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:10%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">You have been granted units representing shares of Common Stock of Overland Storage, Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;) on the following terms: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:48px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TR>

<TR>

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:3.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Granted:</B></FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:3.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Date of Grant:</B></FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD></TR>
<TR>

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:3.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Date:</B></FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD></TR>
<TR>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-right:7%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">You and the Company agree that these units are granted under and governed by the terms and conditions of
the Overland Storage, Inc. 2009 Equity Incentive Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;) and the Stock Unit Agreement, both of which are attached to and made a part of this document. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-right:7%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">You further agree that the Company may deliver by email all documents relating to the Plan or this award (including, without limitation, prospectuses required by the Securities and Exchange Commission)
and all other documents that the Company is required to deliver to its security holders (including, without limitation, annual reports and proxy statements). You also agree that the Company may deliver these documents by posting them on a web site
maintained by the Company or by a third party under contract with the Company. If the Company posts these documents on a web site, it will notify you by email. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:48px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Overland Storage, Inc. </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>2009 Equity Incentive Plan </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Stock Unit Agreement </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="28%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="69%"></TD></TR>


<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Payment for Units</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">No payment is required for the units that you are receiving.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Vesting</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The units vest in installments, as shown in the Notice of Stock Unit Award. In addition, the units vest in full if your Service terminates because of your &#147;Disability&#148; (as
defined in the Plan), or death. The units are also subject to any rights to accelerated vesting you may have under any employment, severance, retention or similar agreement with the Company in effect on the Date of Grant.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Except as described above, if your Service terminates for any reason, then your units will be forfeited to the extent that they have not vested before the termination date and do
not vest as a result of the termination. This means that the units will immediately be cancelled. You receive no payment for units that are forfeited.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The Company determines when your Service terminates for this purpose.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Leaves of Absence and</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:2.00em"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Part-Time Work</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">For purposes of this award, your Service does not terminate when you go on a military leave, a sick leave or another <I>bona fide</I> leave of absence, if the leave was approved by
the Company in writing and if continued crediting of Service is required by applicable law, the Company&#146;s leave of absence policy or the terms of your leave. But your Service terminates when the approved leave ends, unless you immediately
return to active work.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">If you go on a leave of absence, then the vesting schedule specified in the Notice of Stock Unit Award may be adjusted in accordance with the Company&#146;s leave of absence policy
or the terms of your leave. If you commence working on a part-time basis, then the vesting schedule specified in the Notice of Stock Unit Award may be adjusted in accordance with the Company&#146;s part-time work policy or the terms of an agreement
between you and the Company pertaining to your part-time schedule.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Nature of Units</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Your units are mere bookkeeping entries. They represent only the Company&#146;s unfunded and unsecured promise to issue shares of Common Stock on a future date. As a holder of
units, you have no rights other than the rights of a general creditor of the Company.</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">-2-
</FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="28%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="69%"></TD></TR>


<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>No Voting Rights or</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:2.00em"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Dividends</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Your units carry neither voting rights nor rights to cash dividends. You have no rights as a shareholder of the Company unless and until your units are settled by issuing shares of
the Company&#146;s Common Stock.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Units Nontransferable</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">You may not sell, transfer, assign, pledge or otherwise dispose of any units, except pursuant to a Domestic Relations Order. For instance, you may not use your units as security for
a loan.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Settlement of Units</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Each of your units will be settled when it vests (and in all events not later than two and one-half months after the vesting date).</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">At the time of settlement, you will receive one share of the Company&#146;s Common Stock for each vested unit. But the Company, at its sole discretion, may substitute an equivalent
amount of cash. The amount of cash will be determined on the basis of the market value of the Company&#146;s Common Stock at the time of settlement.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Withholding Taxes</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">No stock certificates will be distributed to you unless you have made acceptable arrangements to pay any withholding taxes that may be due as a result of the settlement of this
award. Subject to Applicable Law, upon any distribution of shares of Common Stock in respect of the units, the Company will automatically reduce the number of shares to be delivered by (or otherwise reacquire) the appropriate number of whole shares,
valued at their then Fair Market Value, to satisfy any withholding obligations of the Company or its Subsidiaries with respect to such distribution of shares at the minimum applicable withholding rates. In the event that the Company cannot legally
satisfy such withholding obligations by such reduction of shares, or any other withholding event in respect of the units, the Company (or a Subsidiary) shall be entitled to require a cash payment by you or on your behalf and/or to deduct from other
compensation payable to you any sums required by federal, state or local tax law to be withheld with respect to such distribution or payment.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Restrictions on Resale</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">You agree not to sell any shares at a time when Applicable Law, Company policies or an agreement between the Company and its underwriters prohibit a sale. This restriction will
apply as long as your Service continues and for such period of time after the termination of your Service as the Company may specify.</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">-3-
</FONT></P>

<TR>

<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>No Retention Rights</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Your award or this Agreement does not give you the right to be retained by the Company or a subsidiary of the Company in any capacity. The Company and its subsidiaries reserve the
right to terminate your Service at any time, with or without cause.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Adjustments</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">In the event of a stock split, a stock dividend or a similar change in Company stock, the number of your units will be adjusted accordingly, pursuant to the Plan.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Beneficiary Designation</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">You may dispose of your units in a written beneficiary designation. A beneficiary designation must be filed with the Company on the proper form. It will be recognized only if it has
been received at the Company&#146;s headquarters before your death. If you file no beneficiary designation or if none of your designated beneficiaries survives you, then your estate will receive any vested units that you hold at the time of your
death.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Governing Law</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">This Agreement will be interpreted and enforced under the laws of the State of California (without regard to its choice-of-law provisions).</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>The Plan and Other</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:2.00em"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Agreements</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The text of the Plan is incorporated in this Agreement by reference. Capitalized terms not otherwise defined herein have the meanings given to them in the Plan
document.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">This Agreement and the Plan constitute the entire understanding between you and the Company regarding this award. Any prior agreements, commitments or negotiations concerning this
award are superseded. This Agreement may be amended only by another written agreement between the parties.</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>By signing the cover sheet of this Agreement, you agree to all of the terms and conditions
</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>described above and in the Plan </B></FONT></P>

<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Notice of Stock Unit Award </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-right:7%; text-indent:10%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">You have been granted units representing shares of Common Stock of Overland Storage, Inc. (the &#147;Company&#148;) on the following terms: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The units subject to this award will vest in six (6) equal installments, with the first installment vesting six (6) months after the Vesting Commencement Date and an additional
installment vesting at the end of each six-month period thereafter, subject in each case to your continued &#147;Service&#148; (as defined in the Plan) through the applicable vesting date. Each date on which an installment of this award vests is
referred to as a &#147;Vesting Date.&#148;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Vesting Installments:</B></FONT></P></TD>

15, 2013</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">___shares on July 15, 2013</FONT></P>

15, 2014</FONT></P></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:24px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-right:7%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">You and the Company agree that these units are granted under and governed by the terms and conditions of
the Overland Storage, Inc. 2009 Equity Incentive Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;) and the Stock Unit Agreement, both of which are attached to and made a part of this document. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-right:7%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">You further agree that the Company may deliver by email all documents relating to the Plan or this award (including, without limitation, prospectuses required by the Securities and Exchange Commission)
and all other documents that the Company is required to deliver to its security holders (including, without limitation, annual reports and proxy statements). You also agree that the Company may deliver these documents by posting them on a web site
maintained by the Company or by a third party under contract with the Company. If the Company posts these documents on a web site, it will notify you by email. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"> <P STYLE="font-size:4px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1">Initials&nbsp;<U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U></FONT></P>

 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">-1-
</FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Overland Storage, Inc. </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>2009 Equity Incentive Plan </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Stock Unit Agreement </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="28%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="69%"></TD></TR>


<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Payment for Units</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">No payment is required for the units that you are receiving.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Vesting</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The units vest in installments, as shown in the Notice of Stock Unit Award.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">To the extent then outstanding and unvested, the units will vest in full (i) if your Service terminates because of your Disability or death, or (ii) if a Change in Control occurs
and, at any time within sixty (60) days before or two (2) years after the Change in Control, your Service is terminated by the Company without Cause (as defined below) or by you for Good Reason (as defined below).</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">In the event that your Service is terminated by the Company without Cause or by you for Good Reason and you are not entitled to full vesting as provided above, (a) this award will
vest on the date of termination of your Service (the &#147;Termination Date&#148;) with respect to a number of units determined by multiplying (x) the number of then-outstanding and unvested units that would have otherwise vested on the next Vesting
Date (if any) following your Termination Date (had your employment not terminated), by (y) a fraction, the numerator of which will be the number of whole months that have elapsed between the Vesting Date that immediately preceded your Termination
Date (or, in the case of a termination prior to the initial Vesting Date, the Vesting Commencement Date) and your Termination Date, and the denominator of which will be six (6); and (b) any units subject to this award that are not vested after
giving effect to the foregoing clause (a) shall terminate.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The units are also subject to any rights to accelerated vesting you may have under any employment, severance, retention or similar agreement with the Company in effect on the Date
of Grant (with any such acceleration rights to be applied, in the case of a termination of your Service other than in connection with a Change in Control, after giving effect to the prorated vesting described above).</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Forfeiture</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Except as described above, if your Service terminates for any reason, then your units will be forfeited to the extent that they have not vested before the termination date and do
not vest as a result of the termination. This means that the units will immediately be cancelled. You receive no payment for units that are forfeited.</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">-2-
</FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="28%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="69%"></TD></TR>


<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The Company determines when your Service terminates for this purpose.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Leaves of Absence and</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:2.00em"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Part-Time Work</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">For purposes of this award, your Service does not terminate when you go on a military leave, a sick leave or another <I>bona fide</I> leave of absence, if the leave was approved by
the Company in writing and if continued crediting of Service is required by applicable law, the Company&#146;s leave of absence policy or the terms of your leave. But your Service terminates when the approved leave ends, unless you immediately
return to active work.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">If you go on a leave of absence, then the vesting schedule specified in the Notice of Stock Unit Award may be adjusted in accordance with the Company&#146;s leave of absence policy
or the terms of your leave. If you commence working on a part-time basis, then the vesting schedule specified in the Notice of Stock Unit Award may be adjusted in accordance with the Company&#146;s part-time work policy or the terms of an agreement
between you and the Company pertaining to your part-time schedule.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Nature of Units</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Your units are mere bookkeeping entries. They represent only the Company&#146;s unfunded and unsecured promise, subject to vesting and the other terms and conditions of this
Agreement, to issue shares of Common Stock on a future date. As a holder of units, you have no rights other than the rights of a general creditor of the Company.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>No Voting Rights or</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:2.00em"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Dividends</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Your units carry neither voting rights nor rights to cash dividends. You have no rights as a shareholder of the Company unless and until your units are settled by issuing shares of
the Company&#146;s Common Stock.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Units Nontransferable</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">You may not sell, transfer, assign, pledge or otherwise dispose of any units, except pursuant to a Domestic Relations Order. For instance, you may not use your units as security for
a loan.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Settlement of Units</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Your units that become vested in accordance with the terms of this Agreement will be settled in shares of the Company&#146;s Common Stock on a one-for-one basis. Each unit that
becomes vested on a Vesting Date will be settled on the earlier to occur of (x) the date that is two (2) trading days after the Company&#146;s next earnings release that follows the applicable Vesting Date, and (y) the date that is seventy (70) days
following the Vesting Date; provided, however, that in the event you have (prior to the applicable Vesting Date) entered into an irrevocable arrangement (on terms reasonably acceptable to the Company) with a third-party broker to use the proceeds of
a sale of shares on the market to provide for tax withholding in connection with such vesting event and</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">-3-
</FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="28%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="69%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>

<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">provided the terms of such arrangement to the Company (a &#147;Broker Arrangement&#148;), you and the Company agree that, unless and until otherwise provided by the Company, at the
time of settlement of the vested units, the Company will (a) deliver to your designated broker a number of whole shares, valued at their then Fair Market Value, with a value equal to the withholding obligations of the Company or its Subsidiaries
with respect to the portion of the award that vested on the related Vesting Date at the minimum applicable withholding rates (the &#147;Minimum Withholding Obligations&#148;), (b) retain a number of whole shares, valued at their then Fair Market
Value, with a value equal to the Minimum Withholding Obligations (the &#147;Retained Shares&#148;), and (c) deliver to you the balance of the shares otherwise payable in respect of the vested units. In the case of a Broker Arrangement, the Company
will deliver the Retained Shares to you promptly upon the Company&#146;s receipt of payment of the Minimum Withholding Obligations.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">In the event that any of your units vest in connection with your death or Disability or a termination of your Service, in each case as provided under &#147;Vesting&#148; above, such
vested units will be settled upon or promptly following (and in all events not later than two and one-half months following) the date of such vesting event (or, in the event that you are entitled to additional vesting of your units as a result of a
Change in Control as provided above, the date of the Change in Control event as to any additional units vesting on that event).</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Withholding; Taxes</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">No payment of the units will be made to you unless you have made acceptable arrangements to pay any withholding taxes that may be due as
a result of such payment. With the Company&#146;s consent and subject to all applicable laws and Company policies (including insider-trading policies), these arrangements may include (a) withholding shares of Company stock that otherwise would be
issued to you when the units are settled, (b) surrendering shares that you previously acquired or (c) a Broker Arrangement (as defined above). In the case of clauses (a) and (b) above, the Fair Market Value of these shares, determined as of the date
when taxes otherwise would have been withheld in cash, will be applied to the withholding taxes.</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The award is intended as a &#147;short-term deferral&#148; under Section 409A of the Code and this Agreement shall be interpreted consistent with that intent. Except for the Company&#146;s withholding
right set forth in the preceding paragraph, you will be responsible for any and all taxes that arise with respect to your award.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
</TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">-4-
</FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="28%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="69%"></TD></TR>


<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Restrictions on Resale</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">You agree not to sell any shares at a time when Applicable Law, Company policies or an agreement between the Company and its underwriters prohibit a sale. This restriction will
apply as long as your Service continues and for such period of time after the termination of your Service as the Company may specify.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>No Retention Rights</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Your award or this Agreement does not give you the right to be retained by the Company or a subsidiary of the Company in any capacity. The Company and its subsidiaries reserve the
right to terminate your Service at any time, with or without cause.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Adjustments</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">In the event of a stock split, a stock dividend or a similar change in Company stock, the number of your units will be adjusted accordingly, as the Company may determine pursuant to
the Plan.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Beneficiary Designation</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">You may dispose of your units in a written beneficiary designation. A beneficiary designation must be filed with the Company on the proper form. It will be recognized only if it has
been received at the Company&#146;s headquarters before your death. If you file no beneficiary designation or if none of your designated beneficiaries survives you, then your estate will receive any vested units that you hold at the time of your
death.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Definition of Cause</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">For purposes of this Agreement, &#147;Cause&#148; has the meaning given to such term in any employment agreement between you and the Company as in effect on the Date of Grant or, if
there is no such agreement (or such agreement does not include a definition of such term), shall mean: (a)&nbsp;acts or omissions constituting reckless or willful misconduct on your part with respect to your obligations or otherwise relating to the
business of the Company that causes material harm to the Company or its reputation; (b)&nbsp;your material breach of any agreement between you and the Company, which breach you fail to cure within 30 days after receiving written notice from the
Board that specifies the specific conduct giving rise to the alleged breach; (c)&nbsp;your conviction or entry of a plea of nolo contendere for fraud, theft or embezzlement, or any felony or crime of moral turpitude; or (d)&nbsp;your willful neglect
of duties as reasonably determined by the Board of Directors of the Company, which you fail to cure within 30 days after receiving written notice from the Board that specifies the specific duties that you have failed to perform.</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">-5-
</FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">


<TR>

<TD WIDTH="69%"></TD></TR>


<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Definition of Good</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:2.00em"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Reason</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">For purposes of this Agreement, &#147;Good Reason&#148; has the meaning given to such term in any employment agreement between you and the Company as in effect on the Date of Grant
or, if there is no such agreement (or such agreement does not include a definition of such term), shall mean a voluntary termination by you of your employment with the Company within one year after the initial occurrence of one or more of the
following: (a)&nbsp;the Company reduces your base compensation (including commissions) by more than ten percent (10%), (b)&nbsp;your authority, responsibilities and/or duties are materially reduced so that your duties are no longer consistent with
your position as of the Date of Grant and you no longer report directly to the President or Chief Executive Officer of the Company; (c)&nbsp;a material breach by the Company of any agreement between you and the Company; or (d)&nbsp;the Company
relocates your principal place of work to a location more than fifty (50)&nbsp;miles from the Company&#146;s current office location as of the Date of Grant without your prior written approval; provided, however, that such a termination by you shall
not be a termination for Good Reason unless you notify the Company in writing within 60 days following the initial existence of one of the circumstances constituting &#147;Good Reason&#148;, the Company is given 30 days from the receipt of such
notice in which the Company may remedy or cure such condition, and the Company fails to remedy or cure the condition set forth in your notice within 30 days of receipt of such notice. For purposes of the foregoing, if you do not timely provide
notice to the Company, then you are deemed to have waived this right.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Governing Law</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">This Agreement will be interpreted and enforced under the laws of the State of California (without regard to its choice-of-law provisions).</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>The Plan and Other</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:2.00em"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Agreements</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The text of the Plan is incorporated in this Agreement by reference. Capitalized terms not otherwise defined herein have the meanings given to them in the Plan
document.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">This Agreement and the Plan constitute the entire understanding between you and the Company regarding this award. Any prior agreements, commitments or negotiations concerning this
award are superseded. This Agreement may be amended only by another written agreement between the parties.</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>By signing the cover sheet of this Agreement, you agree to all of the terms and conditions

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-right:7%" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Exhibit 10.44 </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Overland Storage, Inc. </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT

&#147;Company&#148;) on the following terms: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The units subject to this award will vest in six (6) equal installments, with the first installment vesting six (6) months after the Vesting Commencement Date and an additional
installment vesting at the end of each six-month period thereafter, subject in each case to your continued &#147;Service&#148; (as defined in the Plan) through the applicable vesting date. Each date on which an installment of this award vests is
referred to as a &#147;Vesting Date.&#148;</FONT></TD></TR>

<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>

the Overland Storage, Inc. 2009 Equity Incentive Plan (the &#147;Plan&#148;) and the Stock Unit Agreement, both of which are attached to and made a part of this document. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-right:7%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">You further agree that the Company may deliver by email all documents relating to the Plan or this award (including, without limitation, prospectuses required by the Securities and Exchange Commission)
and all other documents that the Company is required to deliver to its security holders (including, without limitation, annual reports and proxy statements). You also agree that the Company may deliver these documents by posting them on a web site
maintained by the Company or by a third party under contract with the Company. If the Company posts these documents on a web site, it will notify you by email. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Overland Storage, Inc. </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>2009 Equity Incentive Plan </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Director Stock Unit Agreement </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="28%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="69%"></TD></TR>


<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Payment for Units</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">No payment is required for the units that you are receiving.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Vesting</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The units vest in installments, as shown in the Notice of Stock Unit Award.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">To the extent then outstanding and unvested, the units will vest in full (i) if your Service terminates because of your Disability or death, or (ii) if a Change in Control
occurs.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">In the event that your Service as a member of the Board terminates due to (i) your removal from the Board by the Company for reasons other than for Cause (as defined below), or (ii)
the expiration of your Board term at a meeting of the Company&#146;s shareholders and you either (x) had been nominated by the Board for re-election at such meeting but were not so re-elected or (y) were not nominated by the Board for re-election at
such meeting for reasons other than Cause, and in each case you were otherwise willing and qualified to continue to serve on the Board at the time your Service terminated, (a) this award will vest on the date of termination of your Service as a
Board member (the &#147;Termination Date&#148;) with respect to a number of units determined by multiplying (I) the number of then-outstanding and unvested units that would have otherwise vested on the next Vesting Date (if any) following your
Termination Date (had your Service not terminated), by (II) a fraction, the numerator of which will be the number of whole months that have elapsed between the Vesting Date that immediately preceded your Termination Date (or, in the case of a
termination prior to the initial Vesting Date, the Vesting Commencement Date) and your Termination Date, and the denominator of which will be six (6); and (b) any units subject to this award that are not vested after giving effect to the foregoing
clause (a) shall terminate.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Forfeiture</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Except as described above, if your Service terminates for any reason, then your units will be forfeited to the extent that they have not vested before the termination date and do
not vest as a result of the termination. This means that the units will immediately be cancelled. You receive no payment for units that are forfeited.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The Company determines when your Service terminates for this purpose.</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">-2-
</FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="28%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="69%"></TD></TR>


<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Nature of Units</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Your units are mere bookkeeping entries. They represent only the Company&#146;s unfunded and unsecured promise, subject to vesting and the other terms and conditions of this
Agreement, to issue shares of Common Stock on a future date. As a holder of units, you have no rights other than the rights of a general creditor of the Company.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>No Voting Rights or</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:2.00em"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Dividends</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Your units carry neither voting rights nor rights to cash dividends. You have no rights as a shareholder of the Company unless and until your units are settled by issuing shares of
the Company&#146;s Common Stock.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Units Nontransferable</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">You may not sell, transfer, assign, pledge or otherwise dispose of any units, except pursuant to a Domestic Relations Order. For instance, you may not use your units as security for
a loan.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Settlement of Units</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Your units that become vested in accordance with the terms of this Agreement will be settled in shares of the Company&#146;s Common Stock on a one-for-one basis. Each unit that
becomes vested on a Vesting Date will be settled on the earlier to occur of (x) the date that is two (2) trading days after the Company&#146;s next earnings release that follows the applicable Vesting Date, and (y) the date that is seventy (70) days
following the Vesting Date.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">In the event that any of your units vest in connection with your death or Disability, a Change in Control or a termination of your Service, in each case as provided under
&#147;Vesting&#148; above, such vested units will be settled upon or promptly following (and in all events not later than two and one-half months following) the date of such vesting event.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Withholding; Taxes</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">No payment of the units will be made to you unless you have made acceptable arrangements to pay any withholding taxes that may be due as
a result of such payment. With the Company&#146;s consent and subject to all applicable laws and Company policies (including insider-trading policies), these arrangements may include (a) withholding shares of Company stock that otherwise would be
issued to you when the units are settled, (b) surrendering shares that you previously acquired or (c) an arrangement with a third-party broker to use the proceeds of a sale of shares on the market to provide for tax withholding. In the case of
clauses (a) and (b) above, the Fair Market Value of these shares, determined as of the date when taxes otherwise would have been withheld in cash, will be applied to the withholding taxes.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The award is intended as a &#147;short-term deferral&#148; under Section 409A of the
Code and this Agreement shall be interpreted consistent with that intent. Except for the Company&#146;s withholding right set forth in the preceding paragraph, you will be responsible for any and all taxes that arise with respect to your
award.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
</TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">-3-
</FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="28%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="3%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="69%"></TD></TR>


<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="8"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="8" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Restrictions on Resale</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">You agree not to sell any shares at a time when Applicable Law, Company policies or an agreement between the Company and its underwriters prohibit a sale. This restriction will
apply as long as your Service continues and for such period of time after the termination of your Service as the Company may specify.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>No Retention Rights</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Your award or this Agreement does not give you the right to be retained by the Company or a subsidiary of the Company in any capacity. The Company and its subsidiaries reserve the
right to terminate your Service at any time, with or without cause.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Adjustments</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">In the event of a stock split, a stock dividend or a similar change in Company stock, the number of your units will be adjusted accordingly, as the Company may determine pursuant to
the Plan.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Beneficiary Designation</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">You may dispose of your units in a written beneficiary designation. A beneficiary designation must be filed with the Company on the proper form. It will be recognized only if it has
been received at the Company&#146;s headquarters before your death. If you file no beneficiary designation or if none of your designated beneficiaries survives you, then your estate will receive any vested units that you hold at the time of your
death.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Definition of Cause</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">For purposes of this Agreement, &#147;Cause&#148; shall mean: (a)&nbsp;acts or omissions constituting reckless or willful misconduct on your part with respect to your obligations or
otherwise relating to the business of the Company that causes material harm to the Company or its reputation; (b)&nbsp;your material breach of any agreement between you and the Company, which breach you fail to cure within 30 days after receiving
written notice from the Board that specifies the specific conduct giving rise to the alleged breach; (c)&nbsp;your conviction or entry of a plea of nolo contendere for fraud, theft or embezzlement, or any felony or crime of moral turpitude; or
(d)&nbsp;your willful neglect of duties as reasonably determined by the Board, which you fail to cure within 30 days after receiving written notice from the Board that specifies the specific duties that you have failed to perform.</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Governing Law</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">This Agreement will be interpreted and enforced under the laws of the State of California (without regard to its choice-of-law provisions).</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="16"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="16" COLSPAN="2"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" NOWRAP> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>The Plan and Other</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:2.00em"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Agreements</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The text of the Plan is incorporated in this Agreement by reference. Capitalized terms not otherwise defined herein have the meanings given to them in the Plan
document.</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">-4-
</FONT></P>

<TD VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">This Agreement and the Plan constitute the entire understanding between you and the Company regarding this award. Any prior agreements, commitments or negotiations concerning this
award are superseded. This Agreement may be amended only by another written agreement between the parties.</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>By signing the cover sheet of this Agreement, you agree to all of the terms and conditions
</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>described above and in the Plan. </B></FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Exhibit 10.45 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>OVERLAND STORAGE, INC. </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>2009 EQUITY INCENTIVE PLAN </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>STOCK APPRECIATION RIGHTS AWARD AGREEMENT </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-right:7%; text-indent:5%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>THIS STOCK APPRECIATION RIGHTS AWARD AGREEMENT</B> (this &#147;<B>Award Agreement</B>&#148;) dated June&nbsp;29, 2011 by and between Overland Storage, Inc, a California corporation (the
&#147;<B>Company</B>&#148;), and <U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U>(the &#147;<B>Grantee</B>&#148;) evidences the award (the <B>&#147;Award&#148;</B>) granted by the Company to the Grantee of the number
of stock appreciation rights (the &#147;<B>SARs</B>&#148;) first set forth below. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TR>

<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Expiration Date:</B></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP

<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;</I><B><U>Vesting</U></B><B><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"></SUP></FONT></B><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">
</SUP><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">1,2</SUP><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex"><B> </B></SUP><B><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"></FONT></B><I><FONT

<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-right:7%; text-indent:5%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The Award is granted under the Overland Storage, Inc. 2009 Equity Incentive Plan (the
&#147;<B>Plan</B>&#148;) and subject to the Terms and Conditions of Stock Appreciation Rights (the &#147;<B>Terms</B>&#148;) attached to this Award Agreement (incorporated herein by this reference) and to the Plan. The Award has been granted to the
Grantee in addition to, and not in lieu of, any other form of compensation otherwise payable or to be paid to the Grantee. Capitalized terms are defined in the Plan if not defined herein. The parties agree to the terms of the Award set forth herein.
The Grantee acknowledges receipt of a copy of the Terms, the Plan and the Prospectus for the Plan. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-right:7%; text-indent:5%"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B><U>Note</U></B>: This Award Agreement collectively amends and restates in their entirety the Notices of Grant of
Stock Options and Option Agreements each dated as of <U>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</U>, between the Grantee and the Company (collectively, the &#147;<B>Option
Agreements</B>&#148;). The purpose of this amendment and restatement is to provide that, upon exercise, the Award will be settled in cash or Common Stock in the Company&#146;s discretion. The Grantee expressly acknowledges and agrees that
(1)&nbsp;this Award Agreement supersedes and replaces the Option Agreements in their entirety, (2)&nbsp;if and when the Award is exercised in accordance with and subject to its terms and conditions, the Grantee will have the right to receive a cash
payment or shares of Common Stock, as the Company may determine at that time, and (3)&nbsp;except for such provision for a possible cash payment upon exercise, the other substantive terms of the Award set forth in this Award Agreement (including the
Number of SARs, Exercise Price per SAR, Award Date, Expiration Date and Vesting schedule set forth above) correspond to the terms of the original Option Agreements. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">1</SUP>&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Subject to adjustment under Section&nbsp;10.1 of the Plan. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="2%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">2</SUP>&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Subject to early termination under Section&nbsp;4 of the Terms and Section&nbsp;10.2 and 10.3 of the Plan. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF STOCK APPRECIATION RIGHTS </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>1.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B><U></U><U>Vesting; Limits on Exercise</U></B>. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The Award shall vest and become exercisable in percentage installments of the aggregate number of SARs subject to the Award as set forth on the cover page of this Award Agreement. The SARs may be
exercised only to the extent the SARs are vested and exercisable. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><U>Cumulative Exercisability</U>. To the extent that the SARs are vested and exercisable, the Grantee has the right to exercise the SARs (to the extent
not previously exercised), and such right shall continue, until the expiration or earlier termination of the SARs. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><U>No Fractional SARs</U>. Fractional SARs shall be disregarded, but may be cumulated. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="6%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">&#149;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><U>Minimum Exercise</U>. No fewer than 100 SARs (subject to adjustment under Section&nbsp;10.1 of the Plan) may be exercised at any one time, unless
